item.title: DeFranco Family - Save The Last Dance For Me
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8649

You can dance
every dance
With the guy who
gives you the eyes
Let him hold you tight
you can smile
Every smile
for the man who
Held your hand
a neath
Pale moonlight
but don’t forget
Who’s taking you home
and in whose arms
Your gonna be
so darling
Save the last
dance for me
Oh oh I know that
the music is
Fine like
sparkling wine
Go and have your fun
large and sing
But while you’re apart
don’t give
Your heart to anyone
but don’t forget
Who’s taking you home
and in whose arms
You gonna be
so darling
Save the last
dance for me
Oh
baby don’t you know
I love you so
can’t you feel it
When we touch
I’d never ever
Let you go
I love you
Oh so much
you can dance go
And carry on until
the night is gone
And it’s time to go
If he asks it
You’re all alone
can he take you home
You must tell him no
but don’t forget
Who’s taking you home
and in whose arms
You gonna be
so darling
Save the last
dance for me-

Because don’t forget
who’s taking you home
And in whose arms
you gonna be
So darling
save the last
Dance for me
oh
Save the last
dance for me
Ah-
save the last
Dance for me
ah-
Save the last
dance for me
Save the last
dance for me-
